name: auraa-ai-agent
description: MCP configuration for AI agents working on Auraa-AI

neverSkipIssues.description: NEVER skip or ignore any issues. Every error, warning, or problem MUST be addressed.
examples: Fix all linting errors, not just some
Address all type errors, not just suppress them

alwaysFixCorrectly.description: ALWAYS fix issues correctly with proper formatting. NEVER take shortcuts or assume.
requirements: Follow existing code patterns and style

noShortcutsOrAssumptions.description: NEVER take shortcuts or make assumptions. Be comprehensive and thorough.
forbidden: Using @ts-ignore or eslint-disable to hide issues
Commenting out broken code instead of fixing it
Quick hacks that don't follow patterns

onStart: Read .ai/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md - PAY SPECIAL ATTENTION to Core Principle #2: Never Skip Issues
REMEMBER: Never skip issues, always fix correctly, never take shortcuts
beforeChange: Check for existing patterns to follow
Identify ALL issues that need fixing (not just some)
Plan the proper fix approach (no shortcuts)
afterChange: Run npm run lint - fix ALL errors and warnings
Run npm run build - ensure clean build with no errors
Run npm test - all tests must pass
Verify proper formatting and code style
Confirm NO issues were skipped or shortcuts taken
onError: NEVER skip the error - it MUST be fixed
Seek clarification if needed, but do not proceed until resolved

formatting.requirement: All code must follow project formatting standards exactly

typeChecking.requirement: All TypeScript code must type-check without errors
typeChecking.noSuppressions: Do not use @ts-ignore or any type suppressions
